name: InFridge
description: This was a group project and an opportunity to work on a coding project collaboratively. It's been a fantastic opportunity to train on using GitHub branches and pull requests, as well as the GitHub projects page.

name: Template Switcher
description: This was a group project and an opportunity to work on a coding project collaboratively. It's been a fantastic opportunity to train on using GitHub branches and pull requests, as well as the GitHub projects page.

name: Password Generator
description: I created a Password generator app that runs in the browser and features dynamically updated HTML and CSS, all powered by JavaScript code that I wrote. The app has a clean and polished user interface that is responsive, ensuring that it adapts to multiple screen sizes. The password can include special characters.

name: Weather Dashboard
description: A Weather Dashboard with a search that shows users current Weather and 5 day prognosis by city name.

name: Daily Planner
description: A Daily Planner app that allows users to plan their work day by saving items for each task per hours and colours past/present and future time differently.

name: Accordion
description: A small app to showcase CSS and JS run accordion

name: Currency Converter
description: A small test app for converting from EUR to USD and back

name: Images API
description: A small app to showcase top 10 images from Unsplash

name: Fruit Inc
description: Demo game for buying/purchasing fruit (POC only)

name: IP Mapper
description: A small app that gets your public IP and shows it's closest location on a map
